plugins.name: FontChanger by CreativeRafat
plugins.description: FontChanger is a powerful Figma plugin that converts all text fonts in your design into a dynamic font variable. Simply input your desired font, and FontChanger will update all text layers while maintaining flexibility through Figma’s typography system. Save time, stay consistent, and streamline your design workflow effortlessly!
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly transform your Figma fonts with just one click!

122589.name: FontChanger by CreativeRafat
122589.description: FontChanger is a powerful Figma plugin that converts all text fonts in your design into a dynamic font variable. Simply input your desired font, and FontChanger will update all text layers while maintaining flexibility through Figma’s typography system. Save time, stay consistent, and streamline your design workflow effortlessly!
122589.tagline: Effortlessly transform your Figma fonts with just one click!

plugins.name: Text Style Group Clone
plugins.description:
This simple plugin duplicates local text styles by hierarchy. It’s useful when creating multiple text styles, such as sans-serif and serif, or desktop and mobile variants.

Due to Figma API limitations, font settings such as Details and Variables are not copied.


登録されているテキストスタイルをグループごと複製するのプラグインです。

Figma APIで取得できないOpenType FeaturesやVariable設定はコピーできません。
plugins.tagline: Duplicate hierarchical text styles. (Only basic font settings are copied.)

120111.name: Text Style Group Clone
120111.description:
This simple plugin duplicates local text styles by hierarchy. It’s useful when creating multiple text styles, such as sans-serif and serif, or desktop and mobile variants.

Due to Figma API limitations, font settings such as Details and Variables are not copied.


登録されているテキストスタイルをグループごと複製するのプラグインです。

Figma APIで取得できないOpenType FeaturesやVariable設定はコピーできません。
120111.release_notes: Updated to also copy Vertical Trim and Underline settings when duplicating text styles.
120111.tagline: Duplicate hierarchical text styles. (Only basic font settings are copied.)

plugins.name: Floating Finder
plugins.description:
When designing in Figma, objects that appear to be within a frame but are actually outside of it will disappear when exported to PDF. Floating Finder detects “floating objects” within multiple selected frames and corrects them.


Figmaでデザイン作業中、「見た目はフレーム内にあるのに、実は外にある」オブジェクトがあると、PDF書き出しした時に消えてしまいます。Floating Finderは、選択した複数フレーム内にある“浮遊オブジェクト”を検出し、修正します。
plugins.tagline: Detect and Fix Floating Objects Outside Frames

130130.name: Floating Finder
130130.description:
When designing in Figma, objects that appear to be within a frame but are actually outside of it will disappear when exported to PDF. Floating Finder detects “floating objects” within multiple selected frames and corrects them.


Figmaでデザイン作業中、「見た目はフレーム内にあるのに、実は外にある」オブジェクトがあると、PDF書き出しした時に消えてしまいます。Floating Finderは、選択した複数フレーム内にある“浮遊オブジェクト”を検出し、修正します。
130130.tagline: Detect and Fix Floating Objects Outside Frames

plugins.name: Typosys
plugins.description:
Typosys is a Figma plugin designed to simplify and accelerate the creation and management of typography systems.

By selecting a base font and size, you can effortlessly generate styles that scale proportionally. The plugin supports custom naming, font faces, weights, sizes, line heights, and letter spacing. It also introduces a multi-dimensional mode system, allowing you to tailor styles for specific devices like desktop, tablet, and mobile. Once completed, the styles are imported into Figma, fully linked to dynamically generated variable collections.



Benefits


  1. Faster workflow: Set up your typography system in minutes.
  2. Consistent scaling: Styles are proportional to the base size for a cohesive design.
  3. Flexibility: Each style can be individually customized.
  4. Device-specific optimization: Use modes to adjust styles for different screen sizes.
  5. Variable integration: Styles are automatically connected to dynamic Figma variable collections.



Key Features


  1. Base font and size selection
  2. Proportional typography style generation
  3. Customizable font face, weight, size, line-height, and letter-spacing
  4. Mode-based dimensions (Desktop, Tablet, Mobile)
  5. Automatic variable generation and linking
  6. One-click import

accepted.name: Roland Hidvegi
accepted.description: Roland Hidvegi is a Product Designer — crafting digital experiences, from vision to final touches, passionate about creating things that make people happy.

plugins.tagline: Streamline your typography system in seconds.

110303.description:

It also introduces a multi-dimensional mode system, allowing you to tailor styles for specific devices like desktop, tablet, and mobile. Once completed, the styles are imported into Figma, fully linked to dynamically generated variable collections.

110303.tagline: Streamline your typography system in seconds.

plugins.description: Easily paste your SVG code and convert it into editable vector layers directly inside Figma. No need to import files or use external tools.
plugins.tagline: Quickly insert SVG code as vector shapes in Figma

135487.description: Easily paste your SVG code and convert it into editable vector layers directly inside Figma. No need to import files or use external tools.
135487.tagline: Quickly insert SVG code as vector shapes in Figma

plugins.name: SaaStack
plugins.description: SaaStack is a Figma plugin built to supercharge your SaaS product design workflow. Instantly browse, preview, and drag high-quality, customizable UI components like navbars, cards, charts, and tables—ready to drop into your design file. Whether you’re prototyping dashboards or refining app interfaces, SaaStack helps you design faster and smarter with consistent, production-grade elements.
plugins.tagline: Your SaaS UI Starter Kit.

135561.name: SaaStack
135561.description: SaaStack is a Figma plugin built to supercharge your SaaS product design workflow. Instantly browse, preview, and drag high-quality, customizable UI components like navbars, cards, charts, and tables—ready to drop into your design file. Whether you’re prototyping dashboards or refining app interfaces, SaaStack helps you design faster and smarter with consistent, production-grade elements.

plugins.name: Variables Cleaner
plugins.description: Variables Cleaner scans your selected Figma variable collection for orphaned string variables (those not referenced by any text layers) and shows you the total count. Preview and select which ones to remove, then clean up your file with a single click. Keep your designs tidy without hunting down dead string variables by hand!
plugins.tagline: Instantly find and remove unused string variables in Figma in one click.

131026.name: Variables Cleaner
131026.description: Variables Cleaner scans your selected Figma variable collection for orphaned string variables (those not referenced by any text layers) and shows you the total count. Preview and select which ones to remove, then clean up your file with a single click. Keep your designs tidy without hunting down dead string variables by hand!
131026.release_notes:
• Split progress reporting
Pages: “Scanning page X of N…” (scan-progress-pages)
Nodes: “Scanning node X of M…” (scan-progress-nodes)

• Crash fix on large files
Guard against missing variable references - unfound vars now render blank instead of throwing.
131026.tagline: Instantly find and remove unused string variables in Figma in one click.

plugins.name: ColorSync by Blader
plugins.description:
Plugin Description


ColorSync by Blader is an advanced tool for designers who need to generate professional color palettes, precise color harmonies, and perfectly balanced gradients. It uses functional algorithms to ensure professional-quality results directly in Figma.


Detailed Feature Breakdown


1. Core Controls


Color Picker


  1. Function: Sets the base color for all harmonies.
  2. Usage: Click to select any hue or manually enter HEX values.


Color Quantity


  1. Function: Controls palette size (1-20 colors).
  2. Pro Tip: Use 3-5 colors for minimalism, 10+ for complex systems.


Color Format


  1. Options: HEX, RGB, HSL.
  2. Function: Toggles value display (e.g., #FF5733 → rgb(255, 87, 51) → hsl(12, 100%, 60%)).


Dark/Light Mode


  1. Function: Optimizes UI for low-light or bright environments.


2. Harmony Types


  1. Each option uses color theory principles:


Complementary


  1. What it does: Creates 2 opposing colors (180° apart).
  2. Best for: Maximum contrast (CTAs, alerts).


Analogous


  1. What it does: Generates 3-5 adjacent colors (30° increments).
  2. Best for: Harmonious designs (branding, backgrounds).


Tints, Shades & Tones


  1. What it does: Produces luminosity/saturation variations (+20% tints, -20% shades).
  2. Best for: Design systems needing consistent scales.


Compound


  1. What it does: Blends complementary + analogous colors (4-6 colors).
  2. Best for: Data viz, illustrations requiring depth.


3. Output Sections


Generated Palette


  1. Content: Displays colors based on your settings.
  2. Pro Tip: Click any swatch to copy its value.


Color Buttons


  1. Function: Compact palette for quick design integration.


Gradient Generator


  1. What it does: Creates CSS-ready gradients from your palette.
  2. Usage: Copy/paste directly into Figma styles or CSS.


4. Advanced Features


Multilingual Support


  1. English, Spanish, and Chinese localization.


Smart Copy


On click:


  1. Shows "Copied!" confirmation
  2. Auto-formats to selected color space


Professional Use Cases


  1. UI Design: Build component libraries with perfect contrast ratios.
  2. Branding: Test logo color combinations instantly.
  3. Illustration: Find coherent shadow/light palettes.
  4. Presentations: Create slide decks with harmonious schemes.


Sample Workflow


  1. Set corporate blue (#2E86AB) as base color.


  1. Select "Compound" harmony with 6 colors.
  2. Copy the auto-generated gradient for hero banners.
  3. Export HSL values for design documentation.
plugins.tagline: Pro-grade color harmonies & palettes in one click

plugins.name: Round to 8
plugins.description:
Round to 8 helps you maintain consistent spacing and measurements in your designs by automatically rounding values to multiples of 4, 8, or any custom value.


🎯 Key Features:

• Round multiple properties at once:

- Auto Layout (Padding & Spacing)

- Position (X & Y coordinates)

- Size (Width & Height)

- Font Size

- All Properties option


🎨 Flexible Options:

• Choose your rounding multiple:

- Multiple of 4

- Multiple of 8 (recommended for most designs)

- Custom value for specific needs


🔍 Smart Selection:

• Apply to selected elements only

• Include all children elements

• Preserve component instances


💡 Perfect For:

• Maintaining consistent spacing in design systems

• Cleaning up imported designs

• Ensuring pixel-perfect layouts

• Standardizing measurements across teams


⚡️ Quick Tips:

1. Select any frame or component

2. Choose properties to round

3. Pick your preferred multiple

4. Click Apply and watch the magic happen!


Made with ❤️ for the Figma Community
plugins.tagline: Round your design values to consistent multiples for pixel-perfect layouts

plugins.name: Multiple Text Clone Components
plugins.description:
Summary

Plug-in to duplicate a component and insert text.

When multiple lines of text are entered, they are duplicated with “1 line = 1 component”.

Example: Running with 3 lines of text will duplicate 3 components


コンポーネントを複製して事前に入力したテキストを挿入するプラグインです。

複数行のテキストを入力すると「1行=1コンポーネント」で複製されます。

例：3行分のテキストを入力すると3つのコンポーネントが複製される


Use

  1. Create Components
  2. Place text inside components or add text properties
  3. Enter the text you want to duplicate in the plugin panel
  4. Select and run the component created in 2.


  1. コンポーネントを作成
  2. コンポーネントの中にテキストを配置、もしくはテキストプロパティを追加
  3. 複製したいテキストをプラグインパネルに入力
  4. 2で作成したコンポーネントを選択して実行
plugins.tagline: Plug-in to duplicate a component and insert text.

plugins.name: Frame Tag - generator
plugins.description:
Create tags with the layer name outside the selected frame or component.


Frame tags are visible only in the Figma file, they help organize or mark selected frames in the assembly.


To customize the style of the label, choose a background and font color, then click Create.
plugins.tagline: Create tags with the layer name outside the selected frame or component.

105895.description:

plugins.name: BatchGen
plugins.description:
BatchGen: Effortlessly Populate Your Figma Designs with Realistic Content


BatchGen is a powerful Figma plugin designed to help designers quickly generate and update content in bulk. Whether it’s names, numbers, addresses, emails, company names, or ratings, BatchGen brings dynamic, customizable data directly into your Figma projects, saving you time and streamlining your workflow.


Key Features:


•Batch Update: Select multiple text layers or search within groups to quickly batch update content.

•Random Numbers: Generate random numbers with optional prefixes to create custom combinations.

•Random Names: Create realistic names (first, last, or full) with options for prefixes and gender.

•Random Dates: Generate dates within a specified range in your preferred format.


Pro Features:


Unlock premium content generation for even more customization:


•Addresses: Generate complete addresses, including postal codes, cities, and countries.

•Emails: Create random email addresses with customizable formats and domains.

•Numbers: Define ranges, formats, and prefixes for random number generation.

•Company Names: Generate unique company names based on industry and location preferences.

•Monetary Values: Create realistic currency values with customizable ranges and currencies.

•Ratings & Scores: Generate ratings in stars, percentages, or decimals with customizable ranges.


BatchGen is the perfect tool for designers who want to enhance their workflow and bring designs to life with ease.
plugins.tagline: Ultimate Content Generation Tool for Figma

117757.name: BatchGen
117757.description:
BatchGen: Effortlessly Populate Your Figma Designs with Realistic Content


BatchGen is a powerful Figma plugin designed to help designers quickly generate and update content in bulk. Whether it’s names, numbers, addresses, emails, company names, or ratings, BatchGen brings dynamic, customizable data directly into your Figma projects, saving you time and streamlining your workflow.


Key Features:


•Batch Update: Select multiple text layers or search within groups to quickly batch update content.

•Random Numbers: Generate random numbers with optional prefixes to create custom combinations.

•Random Names: Create realistic names (first, last, or full) with options for prefixes and gender.

•Random Dates: Generate dates within a specified range in your preferred format.


Pro Features:


Unlock premium content generation for even more customization:


•Addresses: Generate complete addresses, including postal codes, cities, and countries.

•Emails: Create random email addresses with customizable formats and domains.

•Numbers: Define ranges, formats, and prefixes for random number generation.

•Company Names: Generate unique company names based on industry and location preferences.

•Monetary Values: Create realistic currency values with customizable ranges and currencies.

BatchGen is the perfect tool for designers who want to enhance their workflow and bring designs to life with ease.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin authenticates users via post request

117757.release_notes:
BatchGen Release Notes – [Version 2.1]

Release Date: 31/1/2025

🚀 Improvements
•      Security Enhancements: Strengthened data handling and storage to ensure better protection of sensitive information.
•Performance Optimisations: Faster generation of content, reducing processing time and improving overall efficiency.

🛠 Bug Fixes
•Resolved an issue where certain random generation fields were not updating correctly.
•Fixed UI glitches that occasionally caused misalignment in generated content.
•Improved stability when handling large-scale batch operations.
117757.tagline: Ultimate Content Generation Tool for Figma

plugins.name: Colorama
plugins.description:
Type in a hex color value and generate a 0-1000 number range for your primitive tokens. Not sure if this should be closer to 100, 200, or somewhere in between? Plug your values into Colorama and get a precise variable name.


Want them on your canvas? Just a click away.


Need your dark color values to be lower on the number scale? Select the direction to flip the number order on light/dark tones. Then click to copy and paste the values into your Figma variables collection.


Run several values at once with a comma separated text string. For example:

#ff0000, #123ABC, #223344
plugins.tagline: A powerful yet simple way to name your design tokens as primitive variables in Figma.

119934.name: Colorama
119934.description:

Want them on your canvas? Just a click away.


Need your dark color values to be lower on the number scale? Select the direction to flip the number order on light/dark tones. Then click to copy and paste the values into your Figma variables collection.


Run several values at once with a comma separated text string. For example:

#ff0000, #123ABC, #223344
119934.release_notes: Added the ability to place swatches on the canvas to quickly visualize primitive token names and hex values in one spot.
119934.tagline: A powerful yet simple way to name your design tokens as primitive variables in Figma.

plugins.name: Pigment Pilot
plugins.description:
Pigment Pilot is your all-in-one color inspiration companion for Figma. Extract beautiful color palettes from any image, explore millions of curated photos from Unsplash (Soon from Pinterest), and manage your color schemes effortlessly. Perfect for designers who want to create harmonious color combinations from visual inspiration.


🎺 With the new apply feature, see how an extracted color palette would look in real life by applying it on any SVG type image (illustrations, logos etc)


Key Features

🎨 Extract 8-color palettes from any image

🔍 Search and import Unsplash photos directly

💾 Save and organize your favorite palettes

🎯 Create Figma Color Styles instantly

🎭 Generate CSS variables for development

👕 See how your extracted colors would look when used in real designs with "Apply" feature.


Whether you're designing a website, creating a brand identity, or looking for fresh color inspiration, Pigment Pilot helps you build professional color schemes in seconds. Simply select an image, click extract, and watch as it generates a perfectly balanced palette ready for your next design.
plugins.tagline: Pick, Click, Color Magic.

130377.description:

Perfect for designers who want to create harmonious color combinations from visual inspiration.


🎺 With the new apply feature, see how an extracted color palette would look in real life by applying it on any SVG type image (illustrations, logos etc)


Key Features

🔍 Search and import Unsplash photos directly

💾 Save and organize your favorite palettes

🎯 Create Figma Color Styles instantly

🎭 Generate CSS variables for development

👕 See how your extracted colors would look when used in real designs with "Apply" feature.


Whether you're designing a website, creating a brand identity, or looking for fresh color inspiration, Pigment Pilot helps you build professional color schemes in seconds. Simply select an image, click extract, and watch as it generates a perfectly balanced palette ready for your next design.
130377.release_notes:
🎺 The Brand New Apply Tab 🎺

Transform your illustrations with saved color palettes in just a few steps:

1. Select Your Illustration  – Select any frame containing your SVG illustration (Works best with vector illustrations using solid colors) 
2. Choose a Palette – Navigate to the "Apply" tab -> Browse through your saved color palettes -> Click on a palette card to select it.
3. Generate Preview – Click "Generate Assets" to see a preview and you'll get:
[ Original illustration (left) : Transformed illustration (right) ] alongwith a color mapping legend showing the color transformations
4. Review and Iterate – Compare the original and transformed versions side by side, Check the color mapping legend to see how colors were mapped. Try different palettes until you find the perfect match

💡 Pro Tips:
The plugin intelligently maps colors while maintaining visual hierarchy
More vibrant palettes will result in more striking transformations
Works with any number of colors in your illustration
Perfect for creating theme variations of your illustrations

Note: The transformed illustration is created as a new frame, keeping your original artwork untouched.

Whether you're managing a design system, refining UI themes, or simply exploring color variations, Palette Variable Replacer makes it effortless to update and apply color variables in Figma.


🚀 Simplify your color workflow today!

plugins.name: PageStream
plugins.description:
The ultimate Figma plugin you need to create, manage, and share Figma file templates. Whether you’re working solo or part of a large team, this plugin ensures consistency and efficiency when creating design projects. Sound interesting? Create your account and run the plug-in


How it works?

  1. Create and activate your account
  2. Go back to Figma
  3. Log in the plugin
  4. Start creating your templates


Why do I need an account?

You need to create an account to save your templates and use them anytime you need.


What you can do with PageStream?

  1. Generate different templates for your teams or kinds of projects.
  2. Edit or delete the different templates.
  3. Drag and drop the pages to reorganize the list easily when editing.
  4. Did we mention that you can SAVE your file templates?
  5. And YES! Of course you can add emojis


Why did we create PageStream?

We’re really passionate about creating and learning new things, and we absolutely love remote work and team collaboration.

We’ve observed that many teams struggle with inconsistent files, which can make cross-functional and team collaboration a bit tricky. Moreover, all designers know that spending time creating pages can be pretty tedious. So, we challenged ourselves to solve these two problems over the weekend.


We have ideas for the next version, but please, if you have any recommendations or feedback, let us know. We hope you find this plugin handy!


Enjoy the day!
plugins.tagline: Create and save templates for your design file structure.

plugins.name: Pictomate Icons
plugins.description:
Precise, elegant, and consistent icons for designers


Pictomate is a Figma plugin that offers a carefully crafted set of SVG icons — designed for real products, design systems, and teams that care about clarity and consistency.


• Smart search

• Production-ready quality

• Distraction-free workflow


Whether you're building onboarding flows, dashboards, or pricing pages, these icons are made to just work - without visual noise or clutter.


New icon sets and improvements are on the way. Feel free to share feedback or suggestions!


For any questions or custom licensing needs, feel free to reach out: hello@pictomate.com


Created and maintained by Dominik Pacholczyk

plugins.name: QR Code Styler
plugins.description:
QR Code Styler is a feature-packed Figma plugin that allows you to generate and fully customize QR codes directly within your design workflow. Whether you need a simple black-and-white QR code or a beautifully styled one that matches your brand identity, this plugin provides complete creative control.


How It Works:


1. QR Code Generation

Instantly create a QR code by entering any URL, text, or data string. With just a few clicks, the plugin generates a scannable QR code, ready to be styled to fit your design.


Supported Formats:

  1. URLs
  2. email addresses
  3. phone numbers
  4. vCards
  5. plain text


2. Customization Options

Transform standard QR codes into visually appealing design elements with powerful customization features:


  1. Shape Adjustments: Customize the corner radius and dot styles for a unique aesthetic.
  2. Logo Embedding: Place a logo or icon at the center without compromising scannability.


3. Error Correction & Optimization

Ensure scannability even with complex designs by adjusting error correction levels. The plugin optimizes QR codes to remain readable while allowing for creative styling.


Key Features:


Instant QR Code Generation – Create QR codes with various data types in seconds.

Advanced Styling – Customize colors, shapes to match your design.

Logo Embedding – Insert brand logos while maintaining scannability.

Smart Optimization – Adjust error correction levels for reliable scanning.
plugins.tagline: Generate and fully customize QR codes directly within your design workflow.

124046.name: QR Code Styler
124046.description:

plugins.name: ThumbSpan
plugins.description:
ThumbSpan helps you determine which UI elements

are particularly hard to reach with the thumb while using

the phone one-handed.


The Area of Reach of the thumb has been based on empirical evidence, sourced from academic studies. Please see the last picture for the current supported one-handed phone positions, more to be added soon...


How Does it Work

  1. ThumbSpan adds a gradient Layer to your frames.
  2. It is recommended to apply it on a copy of the frame
  3. The Copy should not have any Auto Layout.
  4. It allows you to select Opacity and Hand Position
  5. It also allows you to select between Left and Right Hand
  6. These Layers can be cascaded - applied one after another (You can apply it for both Left and Right hand together)




This Plugin is still in Beta, Please send any bug reports and feature requests to my email: its.shahab.khan10@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Check which parts of your UI within the average thumbspan

plugins.name: Conversor de REM a PX
plugins.description:
Simplifica la conversión entre REM y PX con esta herramienta práctica y eficiente. Este plugin es ideal para diseñadores y desarrolladores que trabajan con unidades relativas y absolutas, permitiéndote calcular valores de forma rápida y precisa.


Características Principales

✅ Conversión bidireccional: Convierte fácilmente entre PX y REM, y viceversa.

🎯 Configuración de tamaño base: Personaliza el tamaño base de fuente (default 16px) para adaptarlo a tus proyectos.

💡 Resultados instantáneos: Obtén los resultados con solo un clic.

📋 Copia fácil al portapapeles: Copia los valores resultantes directamente con un botón.

⚡ Interfaz amigable: Diseño limpio e intuitivo que facilita el flujo de trabajo.


¿Cómo usarlo?

  1. Define el tamaño base de la fuente: Ingresa el tamaño base (por ejemplo, 16px).
  2. Ingresa el valor a convertir: Escribe el número en PX o REM.
  3. Selecciona el tipo de conversión: Elige entre PX a REM o REM a PX.
  4. Presiona "CONVERTIR": Obtén el resultado al instante y cópialo si lo necesitas.


🚀 Feedback Bienvenido

Este conversor es un MVP pensado para facilitar tu trabajo diario. ¿Qué más te gustaría incluir? ¡Déjame tus sugerencias y ayuda a que esta herramienta sea aún más útil!
plugins.tagline: Convierte fácil entre px y rem para un diseño más preciso y consistente.

plugins.name: DesignCrit.ai
plugins.description:
Need quick feedback on a design?

As a designer, sometimes we need to bounce our ideas off someone to quickly get some feedback. A lot of us work remotely and some of us are the only designer on our team. That makes getting feedback quickly not as easy.


New to design?

If you're just starting out, DesignCrit.ai can help you ramp up your skills faster by continuously evaluating your work as you go.

plugins.name: Component Crafter
plugins.description:
Quickly and easily create and manage your components


Features


1.Create Components or Component Sets

Convert any selected layers into components or component sets, with an option to replace them with their instances.


2.Add layers Directly to Existing Components


3.Replace with Component Instances

Swap selected layers with component instances for better design consistency.


4.Advanced Selection Options

Select layers by shared properties before converting them into components.


5.Clone as New Components


6.Instance Management

  1. Select instances on the current page.
  2. Detach instances on the page or across the file.


7.Detach Components

Break components into editable layers while preserving their appearance.


8.Decompose a Component


9.Multi-Language Support
plugins.tagline: Quickly and easily create and manage your components

plugins.name: E-ImageCompression
plugins.description:
E-ImageCompression is a privacy-focused tool that lets you reduce image sizes by up to 90% without sacrificing quality, seamlessly integrated into your workflow.


Your files are never stored on our servers — images are processed securely via the official TinyPNG API and delivered straight back to you.


Batch compress multiple images, preview results, and export everything with a single click.

Perfect for anyone who values speed, security, and high-quality image optimization.
plugins.tagline: Optimize images in one click

137621.name: E-ImageCompression
137621.description:
E-ImageCompression is a privacy-focused tool that lets you reduce image sizes by up to 90% without sacrificing quality, seamlessly integrated into your workflow.


Your files are never stored on our servers — images are processed securely via the official TinyPNG API and delivered straight back to you.


Batch compress multiple images, preview results, and export everything with a single click.

Perfect for anyone who values speed, security, and high-quality image optimization.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin uses TinyPNG API for image compression. Since TinyPNG API doesn't support CORS directly, we use a CORS proxy (cors.siteceterum.ru) for secure API communication.

plugins.description:
Features

  1. Create sections without manually changing colors each time.
  2. Add headers to organize your frames horizontally or vertically.
  3. Access features through the UI or quick menu actions.
  4. Set up keyboard shortcuts to perform quick menu actions faster.


How it works

  1. Select the layers you want to organize.
  2. Click an option from the UI or run it from the plugin menu.
  3. Sections and headers are created and aligned to your selections.


Alternatively, you can add sections or headers directly on the canvas without selecting any layers.
plugins.tagline: Create sections and e

104131.name: Quick Section
104131.description:
Features

  1. Create sections without manually changing colors each time.
  2. Add headers to organize your frames horizontally or vertically.
  3. Access features through the UI or quick menu actions.
  4. Set up keyboard shortcuts to perform quick menu actions faster.


How it works

  1. Select the layers you want to organize.
  2. Click an option from the UI or run it from the plugin menu.
  3. Sections and headers are created and aligned to your selections.


Alternatively, you can add sections or headers directly on the canvas without selecting any layers.
104131.release_notes:
Change header text size to 96
Changed vertical header text width to fill

plugins.name: Nong's Content Filler
plugins.description:
Usage:

  1. Fill Specific Content: Select the text that needs to be filled (single or multiple selections), click the type button, and the relevant content will be automatically filled.
  2. Custom Fill: Select the text that needs to be filled (single or multiple selections), enter custom content in the text box (one entry per line), and click the Apply button. The selected text will be automatically filled with the custom content.
  3. Chinese-English Translation: Select the text that needs to be filled (single selection), enter Chinese content in the text box, and click the Translate button. The translated English content will be automatically filled in the selected text.


使用方式：

  1. 填充特定内容：选择需要填充的文字（单个或多个），点击类型按钮，则自动填充相关内容。
  2. 自定义填充：选择需要填充的文字（单个或多个），在文本框内输入自定义内容（每行一个），点击Apply按钮，则自动填充成输入的自定义内容。
  3. 中英翻译：选择需要填充的文字（单个），在文本框内输入中文内容，点击Translate按钮，则翻译好的英文会自动填充到选择的文字上。
plugins.tagline: Quick Fill Content & Translate

plugins.name: Ripplix - Animation Library
plugins.description:
Ripplix — friction-free design hand-off with motion

Skip the time-consuming prototypes and pin real-world interactions straight onto your Figma file.

Ripplix already has a curated library of 1 500 + micro-interactions from 300 + live apps & sites into an easy-to-search sidebar. One click drops a comment tag on the exact UI element (button, card, tab…) and links to a full-screen preview on ripplix.com so developers instantly see how it should feel—timing, easing, choreography and all.


Why you’ll use it every hand-off

  1. Contextual pins – Each animation is attached as a Figma comment on the layer you select, so engineers don’t have to hunt for it.
  2. Real-app reference – Every clip comes from production UIs, giving devs proven motion patterns instead of speculative mocks.
  3. Search that speaks UX – Filter by platform (Web, iOS, Android, Watch), pattern (hover, dropdown, empty state…), industry or keyword.
  4. One-click preview – Comment contains a “View on Ripplix” link → opens the HD interaction with playback controls, frame counter and downloadable Lottie/CSS snippets.
  5. Zero bloat – Nothing is embedded in the Figma file except a tiny thumbnail + link, so your files stay light.


Typical Workflow

  1. Select a layer that needs motion polish.
  2. In the Ripplix sidebar search “hover + dropdown”.
  3. Preview candidates; click Add to Figma.
  4. A comment tag appears on your layer, click upon you can preview the motion.
  5. During hand-off, devs open the link, watch the real interaction, and build it confident they’re matching the reference.


Need help or want to suggest an animation we’re missing?

📧 support@ripplix.com


Install Ripplix → pin a motion reference → ship delightful, on-brand interactions—without another endless prototype.
plugins.tagline: Inspiring for better Interaction

plugins.name: CSV Data Automation
plugins.description: CSV Data Automation will help you to create personalised artwork using CSV data.
plugins.tagline: Create personalised artwork using csv easily

130260.name: CSV Data Automation
130260.description: CSV Data Automation will help you to create personalised artwork using CSV data.
130260.release_notes:
Now user can update instance using propertyname:key

example-
name|@buttons|@icons
Item1|style:primary|type:star
Item2|style:secondary|type:heart
Item3|style:danger|type:circle

Here @button will be your actual button instance, style is propertyname, primary is key.
Also text layer can be detected using Hashtag "#" & Instances using "@".
130260.tagline: Create personalised artwork using csv easily
